text: Great Stage Park during the 2010 Bonnaroo Music Festival Great Stage Park is a 650-acre (2.63 km2) outdoor event space located southeast of Nashville in Manchester, Tennessee. Since 2002 it has been home to the Bonnaroo Music and Arts Festival, the largest outdoor festival in North America. It will also be the site of the upcoming Exit 111 Festival in October 2019. ==External links== * GreatStagePark.com Official Site * Bonnaroo.com Official Bonnaroo Music & Arts Festival website Category:Bonnaroo Music Festival Category:Music venues in Tennessee Category:Buildings and structures in Coffee County, Tennessee Category:Tourist attractions in Coffee County, Tennessee
title: Great Stage Park
